text: Ana Patricia Abente Brun¿Quién es Ana Brun, la actriz paraguaya que ganó el Oso de Plata? El Digital de Asturias is a Paraguayan actor and lawyer who made her film debut as Chela in Marcelo Martinessi's 2018 drama The Heiresses, which earned her an Silver Bear for Best Actress at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
